messages.message:
I am working on a proposal for a Fed Govt client and the ask is to do OCR and translation of foreign language documents.  One of the requirements is:
Preserves formatting to include tables, graphs, columns of text, paragraph breaks, text color and effects, maps and map legends, headers and footers etc.
Can we do this when we OCR the input document and translate it?
cc: @Matt Macnak
btw all OCR questions should go to the Reader team, so <#C0119EXLXGU|> will be a better fit for your 2 questions
